 * Name                                              RUNWAY
 - Subclass Information                              
 * Comments                                          --- CPTCODE_23001 ----(This anchor is Deprecated)
 DATA_RIGHTS: HONEYWELL CONFIDENTIAL & PROPRIETARY
              THIS WORK CONTAINS VALUABLE CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY
              INFORMATION. DISCLOSURE, USE OR REPRODUCTION OUTSIDE OF
              HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL, INC. IS PROHIBITED EXCEPT AS
              AUTHORIZED IN WRITING. THIS UNPUBLISHED WORK IS PROTECTED BY
              THE LAWS OF THE UNITED STATES AND OTHER COUNTRIES. IN THE
              EVENT OF PUBLICATION, THE FOLLOWING NOTICE SHALL APPLY:
              COPR. 2003 HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL, INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

Code Anchor: CPTcode_SDU_00093
 - Help Book Title                                   
 * Title                                             Runway
 * Console Window                                    BASE_WINDOW
 * Menu Module                                       corept_menu
 - Initial Menu                                      
 - Defer Required Enforcement                        No
 - Menu Role                                         
 - Mouse Navigation Limit                            Form
 - First Navigation Data Block                       
 - Current Record Visual Attribute Group             
 - Validation Unit                                   Default
 * Interaction Mode                                  Non-Blocking
 - Maximum Query Time                                0
 - Maximum Records Fetched                           0
 - Isolation Mode                                    Read Committed
 * Coordinate System                                 
   ----------
   * Coordinate System                               Real
   * Real Unit                                       Point
   * Default Font Scaling                            Yes
   * Character Cell Height                           14
   * Character Cell Width                            7
   ----------
 - Use 3D Controls                                   Yes
 * Form Horizontal Toolbar Canvas                    
 - Form Vertical Toolbar Canvas                      
 - Direction                                         Default
 * Triggers                                          
   ----------
   * Name                                            ON-MESSAGE
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 ON-MESSAGE
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
   msgnum NUMBER       := MESSAGE_CODE; 
   msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := MESSAGE_TEXT; 
   msgtyp VARCHAR2(3)  := MESSAGE_TYPE; 
BEGIN 
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
     CLEAR_MESSAGE;
 -- Begin Fix SCR 5767 
    :parameter.upd_rec:='N';
     set_block_property(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK'),update_allowed,property_true);
  -- End Fix SCR 5767 
     Message('Record has been saved successfully'); 
   ELSIF msgnum in (41051,40350,47316,40353) then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
      null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 40352 THEN -- 7470
			Message('Last Record Retrieved.');
   ELSE 
      display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
      raise form_trigger_failure;
   END IF; 
END; 
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            ON-ERROR
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 ON-ERROR
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
   msgnum NUMBER       := error_CODE; 
   msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := error_TEXT; 
   msgtyp VARCHAR2(3)  := error_TYPE; 
      v_block_name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;   --  Fix SCR 5767 
BEGIN 
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
      Message('Changes saved successfully'); 
   ELSIF msgnum in (41051, 40350, 47316, 40353) then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
      null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 40100 then
   		clear_message;
   		message('At the first record.');
   ELSIF msgnum = 40735 and msgtxt like '%01031%' then
   		clear_message;
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt||' Insufficient privileges. ');
   ELSIF msgnum in (40508,40509) then
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt||chr(10)||chr(10)||
   		'Please check the exact error message from the "Display Error" in the "HELP" menu');
   ELSIF msgnum IN (40200) THEN
   	IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN
   		IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
   	   --Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya-- 14-Sep-2012  			
   			 --Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya-- 17-Sep-2012  			
         IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then 
         	dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
         	name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
         ELSE
         	dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
         END IF;
        --End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 17-Sep-2012 
       --End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012 
   		ELSE
   			dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  	raise form_trigger_failure;			
   	  END IF;	
   	ELSE
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  raise form_trigger_failure;	
   	END IF ;
   	ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
   	  IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN
   	  	null;
   	  ELSE
   	  	dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  	raise form_trigger_failure;
   	END IF;
   ELSE 
      display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
  END IF; 
END; 

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text

   * Name                                            WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE

Initialize_Form;
:global.new_dcr_no := '';--7470
Hide_View('STD_TLD_FIX_STK');--Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
set_block;
if_from_error_summary;

--Begin SCR 7470 --Madhu
DECLARE

	group_id      recordgroup;
	col_id        groupcolumn;
	v_group VARCHAR2(50) := 'NEW_DCR';	
BEGIN
	
	group_id := find_group(v_group);
	IF NOT id_null(group_id) THEN
		DELETE_GROUP(v_group);
	ELSE
		group_id := create_group(v_group);
		col_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'DCR_NO',NUMBER_COLUMN);
	END IF;
END;
--End Fix SCR 7470 --Madhu
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE

     ----------

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.cursor_block like 'PL%' then
	refresh_master_library.set_key_update_false(:System.Cursor_Block);
end if;
		
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
	p_block varchar2(50) := :system.cursor_block;
		v_allow_update NUMBER:= 0; --Fix SCR 5767
BEGIN
	if p_block like 'PL_%' then
	if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' and nvl(name_in(p_block||'.validate_ind'),'N') != 'Y' 
		and name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') is not null then
		do_validate(p_block);
	else
		set_initial_error_display(p_block);		
	end if;	
	
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		if name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag') = 'N' then
			set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'default');
			end if;
		else
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);		
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'default');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');	
			end if;
			if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag') = 'Y' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
				if p_block not like '%MR' then
					set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				end if;
			else	
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
				if p_block not like '%MR' then
					set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'default');
				end if;
			end if;				
		end if;	
	end if;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012					
		IF  :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
				IF name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL  THEN
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(p_block||'.customer_ident'));
				ELSE 
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(p_block||'.customer_ident'));	
			 END IF;	
			ELSE
				IF name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL  THEN
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					ELSE
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					END IF;	
			END IF;
		IF v_allow_update = 1 THEN
						:parameter.upd_rec:='N';
		  			set_block_property(p_block,update_allowed,property_true);
			ELSE
					:parameter.upd_rec:='Y';
		  			set_block_property(p_block,update_allowed,property_false);
		  			IF name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') <> :global.processing_cycle THEN
								RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
		  		END IF;
		  END IF;
--End Fix SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012		
end if;	
END;

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   - Trigger Text                                    

declare
	p_block varchar2(50) := :system.cursor_block;
begin	
if p_block like 'PL_%' and :system.record_status in ('CHANGED','INSERT') then
	if nvl(name_in(p_block||'.validate_ind'),'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') then
		dsp_msg('Validate indicator can only ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'',''N'' or ''I''');
		raise form_trigger_failure;
	end if;	
	if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		validate_extra_fields(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'),name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag'));
	end if;
	if name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') is not null and name_in(p_block||'.DATA_SUPPLIER') is null then
		copy(:global.data_supplier,p_block||'.DATA_SUPPLIER');
	end if;	
	do_validate(p_block);
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		if name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag') = 'N' then
			set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'default');
			end if;
		else
			set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);		
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'default');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'default');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');	
			end if;
		end if;	
	end if;
end if;
end;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No

if :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
	null;
else
	if name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.data_supplier') is not null then
		create_record;
	end if;	
	duplicate_record;
	copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.validate_ind');
	copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number');
	copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.update_dcr_number');
	copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.processing_cycle');
	if ID_NULL(find_item(:system.cursor_block||'.CYCLE_DATA')) then
		null;
	else
		copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');
	end if;
	if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		copy('Y',:system.cursor_block||'.generated_in_house_flag');
	end if;
end if;

   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            PRE-INSERT
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 PRE-INSERT
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

declare
	v_validate_ind   varchar2(1);
	v_dcr_number         number;
	v_processing_cycle number(6);
	v_block_name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;
	v_allow_update       NUMBER := 0; --Fix SCR 5767
begin
	check_wildcard_for_keys(v_block_name);
	  
	IF :system.record_status in ('CHANGED','INSERT') THEN
		 -- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (:global.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL  THEN
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (:global.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;
     -- End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
	END IF;
	IF v_allow_update = 1 THEN  -- Fix SCR 5767
	copy(:global.data_supplier,v_block_name||'.data_supplier');
	copy(0,v_block_name||'.file_recno');
	select dcr_number_seq.nextval into v_dcr_number from dual;
	copy(v_dcr_number,v_block_name||'.create_dcr_number');
	
	-- Do Validation
	do_validate(v_block_name,'N');
	v_validate_ind := name_in(v_block_name||'.validate_ind');
	v_processing_cycle := nvl(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle);
	
	-- Set for refreshing
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
		v_processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) and
		v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
		refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,v_validate_ind,v_block_name,v_processing_cycle,'I');	
	end if;
	--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
   ELSE
		 --Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya-- 17-Sep-2012  			
         IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then 
         	dsp_action_msg ('I',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
         	name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
         ELSE
         	dsp_action_msg ('I',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
         END IF;
        --End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 17-Sep-2012 
   END IF;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
end;
	
	
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            PRE-UPDATE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

declare
	v_block_name         varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;
	v_dcr_number         number := name_in(v_block_name||'.create_dcr_number');
	v_processing_cycle   number(6):= name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle');
	v_table              varchar2(30):= get_block_property(v_block_name,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME);
	v_validate_ind_new   varchar2(1);
	v_validate_ind_old   varchar2(1);
begin
	v_validate_ind_old := refresh_ml_utilities.get_validate_ind(v_table,v_dcr_number);
	if v_validate_ind_old in ('Y','S','H','O') then
		refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(v_dcr_number);
	end if;	
	
	 do_validate(v_block_name,'N');
	--
	v_validate_ind_new := name_in(v_block_name||'.validate_ind');
	if v_validate_ind_old in ('Y','S','H','O') and v_validate_ind_new in ('W','N','I') then
		if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
    	if check_runway_ref('pl_tld_runway',
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.runway_ident'),
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.customer_ident'),      
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.create_dcr_number')) = 'no' then
    		IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(v_block_name) = 'N' THEN
					raise form_trigger_failure;
    		END IF;
    	end if;
    else
    	if check_runway_ref('pl_std_runway',
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.runway_ident'),
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),
                     null,
                     name_in(v_block_name||'.create_dcr_number')) = 'no' then
    		IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(v_block_name) = 'N' THEN
					raise form_trigger_failure;
    		END IF;
    	end if;	
    end if;	
	/*	if refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(v_block_name) = 'N' then
			raise form_trigger_failure;
		end if;*/
	end if;
	-- set for refreshing
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
		v_processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) then	
		if v_validate_ind_new in ('Y','S','H','O') or v_validate_ind_old in ('Y','S','H','O') then
			refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,v_validate_ind_new,v_block_name,v_processing_cycle,'U');
		end if;
	end if;
end;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            KEY-DELREC
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
	v_allow_update number :=0;  --  Fix SCR 5767 
	ls_Block_Name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block; --  Fix SCR 5767 
--Begin Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
	ln_Button NUMBER;
	ln_Dcr_No NUMBER;
	ls_Table_Name VARCHAR2(30);
	ls_Fix_Ident 			Pl_Std_Runway.Runway_Ident%TYPE;
	ls_Airport_Ident 	Pl_Std_Runway.Airport_Ident%TYPE;
	ls_Airport_Icao 	Pl_Std_Runway.Airport_Icao%TYPE;
	ln_Processing_Cycle NUMBER;
	ls_Ref_Info VARCHAR2(1):=NULL;
BEGIN
	ls_Fix_Ident := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Runway_Ident');
	ls_Airport_Ident := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Airport_Ident');
	ls_Airport_Icao := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Airport_Icao');
	ln_Processing_Cycle := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Processing_Cycle');
--End Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
 IF :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
	null;
ELSE
	if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
			--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012		
			IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
				IF name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.customer_ident'));
				 ELSE
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.customer_ident'));	
				END IF;
			ELSE
					IF name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
				 ELSE
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					END IF;	
			END IF;		
		 IF v_allow_update = 1  THEN
     --End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012		
		if display_alert.more_buttons('S','Delete Record',
							'You are going to delete this record. Please be sure.'||chr(10)||' ',
						 'Delete It', 'Cancel') = 1 then
   	DECLARE
			p_table_type varchar2(5) :='M2C';
			ls_Block_Name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;		
			p_table_name varchar2(50):= ltrim(upper(get_block_property(ls_Block_Name,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME)),'PL_');
			v_dcr_number         number := name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.create_dcr_number');
			v_processing_cycle number(6):= name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle');
			v_validate_ind  varchar2(1) := name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.validate_ind');
			v_status        varchar2(10):= :system.record_status;
		BEGIN
			if v_status = 'CHANGED' then -- incase validate_ind is manualy modified by user
				v_validate_ind := refresh_ml_utilities.get_validate_ind(get_block_property(ls_Block_Name,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME),
																							name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.create_dcr_number'));
			end if;
    	if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
    		if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
    			if check_runway_ref('pl_tld_runway',
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.runway_ident'),
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'),
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.customer_ident'),      
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.create_dcr_number')) = 'no' then
    				IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(ls_Block_Name,'D') = 'N' THEN
							--Begin Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
			    			Forms_Utilities.Du_Std_Tld_Fix_Prc(ls_Fix_Ident,
																	 NULL,
																	 ls_Airport_Ident,
																	 ls_Airport_Icao,
																   'P',
																	 'G',
																	 :Global.Data_Supplier,
																		ln_Processing_Cycle,
																		ln_Dcr_No,
																		ls_Table_Name
																		);
			    			ls_Ref_Info := 'N';
			    			Show_View('STD_TLD_FIX_STK');
			    			Hide_View('STD_TLD_FIX_STK'); 			
--End Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
							--raise form_trigger_failure;
    				END IF;
    			end if;
    		else
    			if check_runway_ref('pl_std_runway',
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.runway_ident'),
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'),
                     null,
                     name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.create_dcr_number')) = 'no' then
    				IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(ls_Block_Name,'D') = 'N' THEN
							raise form_trigger_failure;
    				END IF;
    			end if;	
    		end if;	
			end if;
			--
--Begin Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
			IF ln_Dcr_No IS NOT NULL THEN
  			 IF display_alert.more_buttons
                     ('S','Reference Record',
											'This Fix has Reference.Do You Want to Delete the Fix?'||chr(10)||' ',
										 'Yes', 'No') = 1 THEN
						Forms_Utilities.Du_Update_Ref_Table_Prc(Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Create_DCR_Number'),ln_Dcr_No,ls_Table_Name);
				 ELSE					 
					RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
			   END IF;
			ELSIF ls_Ref_Info = 'N' THEN 
				RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 	
			END IF;
--End Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
			if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
				refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(v_dcr_number);
			end if;
			--
			IF :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
				v_processing_cycle IN (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) AND
				v_validate_ind IN ('Y','S','H','O') THEN
				refresh_master_library.refresh_a_record(p_table_type,v_dcr_number,v_processing_cycle,p_table_name,'I');
				delete_record;
				commit_form;
				refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,'I',ls_Block_Name,v_processing_cycle,'D'); -- Added on 01/22/2004
				dsp_msg('The refresh master library table for this deletion is done and all changes are commited.');
			ELSE
				delete_record;
			END IF;
		END;
		end if;
			--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
		Else
		 --Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya-- 17-Sep-2012  			
         IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then 
         	dsp_action_msg ('D',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
         	name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
         ELSE
         	dsp_action_msg ('D',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
         END IF;
        --End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 17-Sep-2012 
		End If;
  --End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012	
	else
		if name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.validate_ind') in ('Y','S','H','O') then
			refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number'));
		end if;
		delete_record;		
	end if;	
END IF;
END;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-FORM-NAVIGATE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

IF :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' AND Name_In('global.check_save') = 'Y' THEN --5320
	Check_Save_PRC('Runway');
END IF;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes

/*This Form is manipulated with PITSS.CON!*/
null;

     ----------

     ----------

     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2

     ----------
     * Column Name                                   DME_ELEVATION
     * Column Type                                   NUMBER
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        0
     * Precision                                     5
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     No
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   FIGURE_OF_MERIT
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        1
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     No
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   ILS_DME_BIAS
     * Column Type                                   NUMBER
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        0

if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
	if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
		set_block_property('pl_std_runway_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE,
		'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
	else
		set_block_property('pl_std_runway_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  	'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
		if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
    	:pl_std_runway_sr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
  	end if;
	end if;
end if;

--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
DECLARE
   v_flag           NUMBER;
   v_allow_update   NUMBER := 0;
   v_block_name     VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
   v_allow_update := 0;
   IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=  validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=  validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;
      IF :global.data_supplier IN ('J', 'L', 'E') THEN
         IF v_Flag IN (6, 4, 3, 2, 1) THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         ELSIF v_Flag = 0 THEN
            --dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or Processing Cycle'); KCL
						IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
						ELSE
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
						END	IF;
            RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      ELSIF :global.data_supplier IN ('Q', 'N')THEN
         IF v_Flag = 5 THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         END IF;
      END IF;
   END IF;
END;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012

if :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle is null then
	:pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
end if;
if :system.record_status != 'NEW' then
  if :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_runway_mr.old_processing_cycle then
  	if check_runway_ref('pl_tld_runway',
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.runway_ident,
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle,
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.customer_ident,      
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number) = 'no' then
	  	IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR','P') = 'N' THEN
				pause;
				:pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_mr.old_processing_cycle;
	  	END IF;
	  end if;	
  end if;	
end if;
:pl_tld_runway_mr.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle;

--Begin Fix -- SCR 7470 --Madhu
IF :pl_tld_runway_mr.chk = 'Y' THEN
      :parameter.multi_rec_del := :parameter.multi_rec_del + 1;
ELSIF :pl_tld_runway_mr.chk = 'N' THEN
      :parameter.multi_rec_del := :parameter.multi_rec_del - 1;
END IF;

DECLARE
	ls_group VARCHAR2(50) := 'NEW_DCR';
	group_id      recordgroup := find_group(ls_group);
	ln_row         NUMBER := Get_Group_Row_Count(group_id);
	col_id        groupcolumn := find_column('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO');	
	col_val       NUMBER;
BEGIN
	IF :pl_tld_runway_mr.chk = 'Y' THEN
		add_group_row(group_id, end_of_group);
		ln_row := ln_row + 1;
		set_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO', ln_row, :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number);

		:global.new_dcr_no := rtrim(ltrim(rtrim(:global.new_dcr_no,', ')||','||:pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number,', '),', ');

	ELSIF NVL(:pl_tld_runway_mr.chk,'N') = 'N' THEN	
		FOR i IN 1..ln_row LOOP
			col_val := GET_GROUP_NUMBER_CELL(col_id, i);
			IF col_val = :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number THEN
				delete_group_row(group_id,i);
				exit;
			END IF;
		END LOOP;
		delete_dcr_no;
	--	END IF;
	END IF;

END;
--End Fix -- SCR 7470 --Madhu

--dsp_msg(:global.new_dcr_no);

     - Tooltip                                       
     - Tooltip Visual Attribute Group                
     - Initial Keyboard State                        Default
     - Reading Order                                 Default
     - Keyboard State                                Any

       * Name                                        WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
       - Subclass Information                        
       - Comments                                    
       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       * Trigger Text                                

--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012
DECLARE
   v_flag           NUMBER;
   v_allow_update   NUMBER := 0;
   v_block_name     VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
   IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;
      IF :global.data_supplier IN ('J', 'L', 'E') THEN
         IF v_Flag IN (6, 4, 3, 2, 1) THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         ELSIF v_Flag = 0 THEN
            --dsp_msg ('Customer is not associated with the '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or Processing Cycle'); KCL
       			IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
						ELSE
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
						END	IF;
            RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      ELSIF :global.data_supplier IN ('Q', 'N') THEN
         IF v_Flag = 5
         THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         END IF;
      END IF;
   END IF;
END;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Ayodya -- 14-Sep-2012

if :pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle is null then
	:pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
end if;
if :system.record_status != 'NEW' then
  if :pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_runway_sr.old_processing_cycle then
  	if check_runway_ref('pl_tld_runway',
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.runway_ident,
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle,
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.customer_ident,      
                     :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number) = 'no' then
  		IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR','P') = 'N' THEN
				:pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_sr.old_processing_cycle;
  		END IF;
  	end if;	
  end if;	
end if;
:pl_tld_runway_sr.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle;

:control_block.from_multiple := null;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          PRE-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments

     * Trigger Text                                  

if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
	set_block_property('std_runway_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE,
	'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
else
	set_block_property('std_runway_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
end if;

:control_block.from_multiple := null;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------

     * Trigger Text                                  

if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
	set_block_property('tld_runway_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE,
	'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
else
	set_block_property('tld_runway_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
end if;

hide_view('TLD_OVER');

 -- Begin Fix - SCR 3569 -Ayodya-- 31-July-2012
IF :parameter.TLD_OVERRIDE_BUTTON_FLG ='MR'
THEN
 go_item('PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.CUSTOMER_IDENT');
ELSIF :parameter.TLD_OVERRIDE_BUTTON_FLG ='SR' THEN
 go_item('PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.CUSTOMER_IDENT');
END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 3569 -Ayodya-- 31-July-2012

       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text

 -- Begin Fix - SCR 3569 -Ayodya-- 31-July-2012
IF :parameter.STD_OVERRIDE_BUTTON_FLG ='MR'
THEN
 go_item('PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.AIRPORT_IDENT');
ELSIF  :parameter.STD_OVERRIDE_BUTTON_FLG ='SR' THEN
 go_item('PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.AIRPORT_IDENT');
END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 3569 -Ayodya-- 31-July-2012

       - Subclass Information

       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       * Trigger Text                                

DECLARE
	group_id      recordgroup := find_group('NEW_DCR');
	ln_row        NUMBER := get_group_row_count(group_id); 
	col_val       NUMBER;	
	ln_row1	NUMBER;
BEGIN


	If :Control_Block.Chk_Unchk_All = 'Y' Then
		--7470
			IF NOT Id_Null(find_group('NEW_DCR')) THEN 
 				Delete_Group_Row( 'NEW_DCR', ALL_ROWS ); 
			END IF;
			FOR i IN 1..ln_row LOOP
			 delete_dcr_no;
			END LOOP;
			ln_row  := get_group_row_count(group_id);

     Go_Block ('pl_tld_runway_mr');
     First_record;
     Loop
     	--dsp_msg(:SYSTEM.Last_Record||'-'||:pl_tld_runway_mr.chk);
     	--IF nvl(:pl_tld_runway_mr.chk,'N') = 'N' THEN
        :pl_tld_runway_mr.Chk := 'Y';
        :parameter.multi_rec_del := :parameter.multi_rec_del + 1;
        add_group_row(group_id, end_of_group);
				ln_row := ln_row + 1;
				--set_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO', ln_row, :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number);
				set_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO', ln_row, :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number);
				:global.new_dcr_no := rtrim(ltrim(:global.new_dcr_no||','||:pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number,', '),', ');
        --Exit When :SYSTEM.Last_Record = 'TRUE';
     		If :pl_tld_runway_mr.Customer_Ident Is Not Null Then
     			Next_record;
     		Else
     			Clear_Record;
     			:pl_tld_runway_mr.Chk := 'Y';
     			Exit;
     		End If;	
     	--END IF;
     End Loop;
     First_record;
    Else
     :parameter.multi_rec_del := 0;
     ln_row  := get_group_row_count(group_id)-1;
     Go_Block ('pl_tld_runway_mr');
     First_record;
     Loop
        IF :pl_tld_runway_mr.chk = 'Y' THEN
	        :pl_tld_runway_mr.Chk := 'N';
	        FOR i IN 1..ln_row LOOP
						col_val := get_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO',i);		
						IF col_val = :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number THEN
							delete_group_row(group_id,i);
							EXIT;
						END IF;
	        END LOOP;
	      END IF;
					delete_dcr_no;
			
	        Exit When :SYSTEM.Last_Record = 'TRUE';
	        Next_record;
	     	/*	If :pl_tld_runway_mr.Customer_Ident Is Not Null Then
	     			Next_record;
	     		Else
	     			Clear_Record;
	     			:pl_tld_runway_mr.Chk := 'N';
	     			Exit;
	     		End If;	*/
	     --	END IF;
       --7470
     End Loop;
     First_record;
    End If;
END;

       * Name                                        WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED

         ----------
       - Comments                                    
       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       - Trigger Text                                

declare
	total_rows   number;
	V_BUTTON     NUMBER(1);
begin
	if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
		dsp_msg('There is changes in the form, please do commit first.');
	else	
		total_rows := get_group_row_count(find_group('Refresh_Records_Group'));
		v_button := display_alert.more_buttons('S','Refresh Record',
								'You have modified or inserted or deleted '||total_rows||' record(s). '||chr(10)||
						  	'Do you want to refresh the Master Library now?'||chr(10)||chr(10),
						    'Refresh', 'Cancel');
		if v_button = 1 then
			refresh_master_library.refresh_records(total_rows);
		else
			null;
		end if;
	end if;	
end;
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text
