   - Program Unit Text                               

/* Formatted on 05-Sep-2011 20:47 (Formatter Plus v4.8.7) */
PROCEDURE check_to_commit (p_action_type VARCHAR2)
IS
   v_button        NUMBER (1);
   total_rows      NUMBER;
   v_temp          VARCHAR2 (4000);
   v_button_text   VARCHAR2 (100);
   msgnum          NUMBER       := MESSAGE_CODE; -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 05-Sep-2011   
BEGIN
   IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED'THEN
   	
      IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
         v_button_text := 'Cancel';
      ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
         v_button_text := 'Exit Without Save';
      ELSE
         v_button_text := 'Cancel Modification';
      END IF;

      IF :GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' THEN
         v_button :=
            display_alert.more_buttons
                       ('S','Refresh Record','You have modified record(s). Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' '|| CHR (10)|| 
                         --'1. Save without refreshing the Master Library'||chr(10)|| -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 05-Sep-2011
                           '1. Save and refresh Master Library'|| CHR (10)|| 
						   						 '2. Cancel modification, NO Save, NO Refresh',
                           'Save&Refresh',v_button_text
                        );

         IF v_button IN (1) THEN -- changed from in (1,2) to in (1) -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 05-Sep-2011
            COMMIT_FORM;
            total_rows := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT (FIND_GROUP ('Refresh_Records_Group'));
            
			      IF total_rows > 0 THEN
               refresh_master_library.refresh_records (total_rows);
            END IF;
         		IF (msgnum = 40400) THEN  -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 05-Sep-2011
             CLEAR_MESSAGE; 
         		END IF;    
		 		 END IF;
      ELSE
         
         IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
            v_button := 1;
         ELSE
            v_button :=
               display_alert.more_buttons
                  ('S','Refresh Record','Record is modified or inserted or deleted. Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' ',
                   'Save',v_button_text
                  );
         END IF;

-- Begin Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 05-Sep-2011
         IF v_button = 1 THEN
            COMMIT_FORM;
            IF (msgnum = 40400) THEN 
            	CLEAR_MESSAGE; 
            END IF; 
         ELSE
            EXIT_FORM (no_commit); 
         END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 05-Sep-2011         
      END IF;

      -- Here the v_button values are chnaged 2 in place of 3, 1 in place of 2 for SCR 5180 - Eswar KC
      IF    (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' AND v_button = 2)
         OR (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed != 'Y' AND v_button = 1)
      THEN
         IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
            NULL;
         ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
            SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
            EXIT_FORM (no_commit);
         ELSE
            CLEAR_BLOCK (no_commit);
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED' THEN
            RAISE form_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      END IF;
   --if :system.form_status != 'CHANGED' then
   -- invalid_record_count(:system.cursor_block,:system.cursor_record,:system.cursor_item);
   --end if;
   ELSE
      refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
   END IF;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DSP_ERROR
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 DSP_ERROR
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE DSP_ERROR(ERR_MSG IN VARCHAR2) IS
  alert_id    alert;
  choice      number(3);
BEGIN
  set_alert_property('ERROR_MESSAGE', alert_message_text,ERR_MSG); 
  alert_id := find_alert ('ERROR_MESSAGE');
  choice := show_alert(alert_id);
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DO_VALIDATE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE do_validate(p_block varchar2,p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
  v_record  sdv_records.cr_runway;       
	v_err_ind	number := 0;
	v_err_list cpt_types.errlist_type;
	v_err			varchar2(200) := null;
	v_all_err varchar2(4000) := null;
	v_srec    pl_std_runway%rowtype;
	v_trec    pl_tld_runway%rowtype;
	v_nerr    varchar2(5) := 'YYYYY'; -- Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011----Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013--Size Increased to 5
	v_valid   varchar2(1) := null;
	v_cycle   number;
	v_ind     varchar2(1) := 'Y';
BEGIN
  if name_in(p_block||'.runway_ident') is not null then
  Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
	else
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
	end if;
  -- Populate v_record;
  populate_record(p_block,v_record,v_cycle);
  -- Perform Structural Validation
  RECSV1.VRUNWAY(:global.data_supplier,v_cycle,v_record,v_err_list,v_err_ind);
  -- Check the result
  IF v_err_ind != 0 THEN
  	for i in 1..v_err_list.count loop
   	  if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_cycle, 'RUNWAY', v_err_list(i)) then
   	  	v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||to_char(v_err_list(i))||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_list(i));
   	  	v_ind := 'I';
   	  else
   	  	if v_ind != 'I' then
   	  		v_ind := 'O';
   	  	end if;
   	  end if;
    end loop;
  END IF;
  -- Perform relational validation
  populate_rel_record(p_block, v_srec, v_trec);
  recrv1.vrunway(:parameter.record_type, v_srec, v_trec, v_nerr, v_valid, p_ignore_ref,'DU'); -- Pass DU argument SCR 7596 --Madhu--06-Sep-2023
  if v_nerr != 'YYYYY' then -- Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    	if substr(v_nerr,1,1) = 'N' then
    	  v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 216 - '||get_err_text(216);
    	end if;
    	if substr(v_nerr,2,1) = 'N' then
    	  v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 266 - '||get_err_text(266);
    	end if;
    	if substr(v_nerr,3,1) = 'N' then
    	  v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 648 - '||get_err_text(648);
    	end if;
    -- Begin Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    	if substr(v_nerr,4,1) = 'N' then
    	  v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 655 - '||get_err_text(655);
    	end if;
    -- End Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
--Begin Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013
      IF SUBSTR(v_nerr,5,1) = 'N' THEN
    	  v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 1167 - '||get_err_text(1167);
    	END IF;
--End Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013
  end if;
  -- Set validate_ind and display message
  Set_Ind_and_Message(p_block,v_all_err, :parameter.work_type, p_ignore_ref, v_ind);
  if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
  	SET_UPDATE_DCR(upper(p_block), v_record);
  end if;
  Set_Override_Button(p_block);
  Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
  ELSE
  	set_initial_error_display(P_BLOCK);
  end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_RECORD
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE populate_record
    (p_block  in   varchar2,
     p_record out  sdv_records.cr_runway,
     p_cycle  out  number) IS       
BEGIN
  -- Populate v_record;
  if upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR' then
    p_record.record_type			               := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_icao                    := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.airport_icao;                                         
    p_record.airport_ident                   := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.airport_ident;                                          
    p_record.cust_area_code                  := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.area_code;                                          
    p_record.cycle_data                      := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.cycle_data;                                          
    p_record.displaced_threshold_distance    := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.displaced_threshold_distance),4,'0');                                          
    p_record.file_recno                      := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.file_recno),5,'0');                                          
    p_record.landing_threshold_elevation     := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.landing_threshold_elevation;            
    p_record.localizer_mls_class             := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.localizer_mls_class;                                    
    p_record.localizer_mls_gls_ident         := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                       
    p_record.runway_description              := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_description;                                         
    p_record.runway_gradient                 := rpad(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_gradient,5,' ');                                    
    p_record.runway_ident                    := rpad(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_ident,5,' ');                               
    p_record.runway_latitude                 := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_latitude;    
    p_record.runway_length                   := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_length),5,'0');                                        
    p_record.runway_longitude                := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_longitude;                                     
    p_record.runway_magnetic_bearing         := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_magnetic_bearing;                                       
    p_record.runway_width                    := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_width),3,'0');                                       
    p_record.second_localizer_class          := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.second_localizer_class;                           
    p_record.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident  := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                    
    p_record.stopway                         := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.stopway),4,'0');                                      
    p_record.threshold_crossing_height       := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.threshold_crossing_height),2,'0');
  	p_cycle                                  := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.processing_cycle;
  	--Begin Fix SCR 7432.03 Harikrishna Ch 20-July-2018
  	p_record.runway_accuracy_comp_ind        := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_accuracy_comp_ind;
    p_record.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind    := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind;
    --End Fix SCR 7432.03
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR' then
    p_record.record_type			               := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_icao                    := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.airport_icao;                                         
    p_record.airport_ident                   := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.airport_ident;                                          
    p_record.cust_area_code                  := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.area_code;                                          
    p_record.cycle_data                      := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.cycle_data;                                          
    p_record.displaced_threshold_distance    := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.displaced_threshold_distance),4,'0');                                          
    p_record.file_recno                      := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.file_recno),5,'0');                                          
    p_record.landing_threshold_elevation     := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.landing_threshold_elevation;
    p_record.localizer_mls_class             := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.localizer_mls_class;                                    
    p_record.localizer_mls_gls_ident         := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                       
    p_record.runway_description              := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_description;                                         
    p_record.runway_gradient                 := rpad(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_gradient,5,' ');                                    
    p_record.runway_ident                    := rpad(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_ident,5,' ');                               
    p_record.runway_latitude                 := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_latitude;    
    p_record.runway_length                   := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_length),5,'0');                                        
    p_record.runway_longitude                := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_longitude;                                     
    p_record.runway_magnetic_bearing         := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_magnetic_bearing;                                       
    p_record.runway_width                    := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_width),3,'0');                                       
    p_record.second_localizer_class          := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.second_localizer_class;                                        
    p_record.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident  := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                    
    p_record.stopway                         := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.stopway),4,'0');                                      
    p_record.threshold_crossing_height       := lpad(to_char(:PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.threshold_crossing_height),2,'0');
    p_cycle                                  := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.processing_cycle;
    --Begin Fix SCR 7432.03 Harikrishna Ch 20-July-2018
    p_record.runway_accuracy_comp_ind        := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_accuracy_comp_ind;
    p_record.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind    := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind;
    --End Fix SCR 7432.03 
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR' then
    p_record.record_type			               := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_icao                    := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.airport_icao;                                         
    p_record.airport_ident                   := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.airport_ident;                                          
    p_record.cust_area_code                  := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.customer_ident;                                          
    p_record.cycle_data                      := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.cycle_data;                                          
    p_record.displaced_threshold_distance    := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.displaced_threshold_distance),4,'0');                                          
    p_record.file_recno                      := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.file_recno),5,'0');                                          
    p_record.landing_threshold_elevation     := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.landing_threshold_elevation;
    p_record.localizer_mls_class             := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.localizer_mls_class;                                    
    p_record.localizer_mls_gls_ident         := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                       
    p_record.runway_description              := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_description;                                         
    p_record.runway_gradient                 := rpad(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_gradient,5,' ');                                    
    p_record.runway_ident                    := rpad(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_ident,5,' ');                    
    p_record.runway_latitude                 := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_latitude;    
    p_record.runway_length                   := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_length),5,'0');                                        
    p_record.runway_longitude                := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_longitude;                                     
    p_record.runway_magnetic_bearing         := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_magnetic_bearing;                                       
    p_record.runway_width                    := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_width),3,'0');                                       
    p_record.second_localizer_class          := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.second_localizer_class;                                        
    p_record.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident  := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                    
    p_record.stopway                         := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.stopway),4,'0');                                      
    p_record.threshold_crossing_height       := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.threshold_crossing_height),2,'0');
    p_cycle                                  := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.processing_cycle;
    --Begin Fix SCR 7432.03 Harikrishna Ch 20-July-2018
    p_record.runway_accuracy_comp_ind        := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.runway_accuracy_comp_ind;
    p_record.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind    := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind;
    --End Fix SCR 7432.03
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR' then
    p_record.record_type			               := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_icao                    := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.airport_icao;                                         
    p_record.airport_ident                   := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.airport_ident;                                          
    p_record.cust_area_code                  := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.customer_ident;                                          
    p_record.cycle_data                      := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.cycle_data;                                          
    p_record.displaced_threshold_distance    := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.displaced_threshold_distance),4,'0');                                          
    p_record.file_recno                      := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.file_recno),5,'0');                                          
    p_record.landing_threshold_elevation     := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.landing_threshold_elevation;
    p_record.localizer_mls_class             := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.localizer_mls_class;                                    
    p_record.localizer_mls_gls_ident         := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                       
    p_record.runway_description              := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_description;                                         
    p_record.runway_gradient                 := rpad(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_gradient,5,' ');                                    
    p_record.runway_ident                    := rpad(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_ident,5,' ');                    
    p_record.runway_latitude                 := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_latitude;    
    p_record.runway_length                   := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_length),5,'0');                                        
    p_record.runway_longitude                := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_longitude;                                     
    p_record.runway_magnetic_bearing         := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_magnetic_bearing;                                       
    p_record.runway_width                    := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_width),3,'0');                                       
    p_record.second_localizer_class          := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.second_localizer_class;                                        
    p_record.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident  := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;                                    
    p_record.stopway                         := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.stopway),4,'0');                                      
    p_record.threshold_crossing_height       := lpad(to_char(:PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.threshold_crossing_height),2,'0');
    p_cycle                                  := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.processing_cycle;
    --Begin Fix SCR 7432.03 Harikrishna Ch 20-July-2018
    p_record.runway_accuracy_comp_ind        := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.runway_accuracy_comp_ind;
    p_record.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind    := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind;
    --End Fix SCR 7432.03
  end if;  
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            INITIALIZE_FORM
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 INITIALIZE_FORM
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE INITIALIZE_FORM IS
	fname	varchar2(100) := get_application_property(CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
	wn_id window := Find_Window('BASE_WINDOW');
	v_name  varchar2(50) := get_window_property(wn_id, TITLE);
	v_block varchar2(30) := Get_Form_Property(fname,FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
	v_err varchar2(300);
BEGIN
	 
  default_value('J','global.data_supplier');
  default_value('I','global.lib_refreshed');
  default_value('99999','global.dcr_number');
  default_value('200406','global.processing_cycle');
  default_value('N','global.from_error_summary');
  default_value('200406','global.recent_cycle');
  default_value('MAXIMIZE','global.Status_Window'); 
  default_value(null,'global.customer_ident');
  default_value(null,'global.allroles');
  default_value('N','global.is_admin');
  default_value('N','global.from_leg_search');
  /*********************************************************************/
  /*********************************************************************/
  /* Global Variables declared Plotting Function- updated as part of scr 2303.00 */
  -- Declaring Common variables
  default_value('cpt','global.user_name');
  default_value('cpt','global.password');
  default_value('cpt','global.connect_string');
  default_value('airport','global.data_type');
  default_value('airport','global.table_name');
  default_value('ml','global.schema_type');
  default_value('blank','global.last_query');  
  :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
  :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
  :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);  
  /*********************************************************************/
  /*********************************************************************/
  
  :global.Status_Window := get_window_property('BASE_WINDOW',window_state);
  if name_in('global.Status_Window') = 'MAXIMIZE' then
		set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, MAXIMIZE);
	else
		set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, NORMAL);
	end if;
  --set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_SIZE, 760, 440);
  
  -- activate all roles
  v_err := set_role(:global.allroles);
  if v_err != 'PASSED' then
		-- The roles cannot be activated
		display_alert.one_button('S','Fatal Error',
		'The roles cannot be activated.  Contact the COREPT Administrator.');
		exit_form;
  else
--  Continue
  if :global.processing_cycle is null then
    begin
      select max(processing_cycle) 
      into   :global.processing_cycle
      from pl_std_airport;
    exception
  	  when no_data_found then
  	   :global.processing_cycle := null;
    end;
  end if;
  :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
  :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
  :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);


	if substr(v_block,1,3) in ('PL_','STD','TLD') then
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			v_name := 'STD '||v_name;
		elsif :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
			v_name := 'TLD '||v_name;
		end if;
		if :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
			v_name := 'PL '||v_name;
		else
			v_name := 'ML '||v_name;
		end if;
	end if;	
	set_window_property(wn_id, TITLE, v_name);
	
/*
	IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;
	END IF;
*/
	
	IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN																	   -- MOD
		activate_role;
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 60);								 -- MOD
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;								   -- MOD
	elsif :global.new_processing_cycle != 111111 then																	   -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 80);                -- MOD
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.old_processing_cycle||' - '||:global.new_processing_cycle; -- MOD
	end if;																																						   -- MOD

	populate_items(fname);
	unset_query_menu_items;
	
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
		-- Create the Refresh Records Group
		declare
			group_id       recordgroup;
			col1_id        groupcolumn;
			col2_id        groupcolumn;
			col3_id        groupcolumn;
			col4_id        groupcolumn;
		begin		
			group_id := create_group('Refresh_Records_Group');
			col1_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'dcr_number',number_column);
			col2_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'table_name',char_column,30);
			col3_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'valida_ind',char_column,1);
			col4_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'proc_cycle',number_column);
		end;
	end if;
	end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_ITEMS
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   airport.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 AIRPORT
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 POPULATE_ITEMS
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE POPULATE_ITEMS(mname IN varchar2) IS
	scr_description	varchar2(100);
	scr_part_number	varchar2(100);
BEGIN	
	get_module_information(mname, scr_description, scr_part_number);
--Begin Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
	IF Name_In('parameter.work_type') = 'VIEW' THEN
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := substr(scr_description,1,instr(scr_description,'/')-1)||substr(scr_description,instr(scr_description,'/')+7);
	ELSE
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := scr_description;
	END IF;
--End Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DATE_TIME := to_char(sysdate,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS');
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_NAME := mname;
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_PART_NUMBER := scr_part_number;
	BEGIN
		SELECT data_supplier_name
		INTO   :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE
		FROM   data_supplier
		WHERE  data_supplier = nvl(:GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER,'T');
	Exception
		When no_data_found then
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE := :GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER;
	End;	
   SELECT DECODE(nvl(:parameter.record_type,'S'),'S','STANDARD','T','TAILORED','UNKNOWN')||', '||:parameter.library_access||', '||
				  DECODE(nvl(:parameter.work_type,'VIEW'),'VIEW','Query Only','Data Entry')
   INTO   :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_RECORD_TYPE
   FROM   dual;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_REL_RECORD
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE populate_rel_record 
     (p_block   in    varchar2,
      p_srec    out   pl_std_runway%rowtype,
      p_trec    out   pl_tld_runway%rowtype) IS
BEGIN
  if upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR' then
    p_srec.airport_icao                      := :pl_std_runway_sr.airport_icao;
    p_srec.airport_ident                     := :pl_std_runway_sr.airport_ident;
    p_srec.RUNWAY_IDENT                      := :pl_std_runway_sr.RUNWAY_IDENT;
    p_srec.validate_ind                      := :pl_std_runway_sr.validate_ind;
    p_srec.localizer_mls_gls_ident           := :pl_std_runway_sr.localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    p_srec.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident    := :pl_std_runway_sr.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    --p_srec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_std_runway_sr.processing_cycle;
    if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_std_runway_sr.processing_cycle then
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :pl_std_runway_sr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
    p_srec.area_code                         := :pl_std_runway_sr.area_code;
    p_srec.data_supplier                     := :pl_std_runway_sr.data_supplier;
    p_srec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_std_runway_sr.create_dcr_number;
    -- Begin Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_srec.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS                 := :pl_std_runway_sr.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS;
    p_srec.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS                 := :pl_std_runway_sr.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS;
    -- End Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_sRec.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing         := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_SR.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing; --Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR' then
    p_srec.airport_icao                      := :pl_std_runway_mr.airport_icao;
    p_srec.airport_ident                     := :pl_std_runway_mr.airport_ident;
    p_srec.RUNWAY_IDENT                      := :pl_std_runway_mr.RUNWAY_IDENT;
    p_srec.validate_ind                      := :pl_std_runway_mr.validate_ind;
    p_srec.localizer_mls_gls_ident           := :pl_std_runway_mr.localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    p_srec.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident    := :pl_std_runway_mr.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    --p_srec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_std_runway_mr.processing_cycle;
    if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_std_runway_mr.processing_cycle then
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :pl_std_runway_mr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
    p_srec.area_code                         := :pl_std_runway_mr.area_code;
    p_srec.data_supplier                     := :pl_std_runway_mr.data_supplier;
    p_srec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_std_runway_mr.create_dcr_number;
    -- Begin Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_srec.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS                 := :pl_std_runway_mr.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS;
    p_srec.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS                 := :pl_std_runway_mr.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS;
    -- End Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_sRec.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing         := :PL_STD_RUNWAY_MR.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing;--Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR' then
    p_trec.airport_icao                      := :pl_tld_runway_sr.airport_icao;
    p_trec.airport_ident                     := :pl_tld_runway_sr.airport_ident;
    p_trec.RUNWAY_IDENT                      := :pl_tld_runway_sr.RUNWAY_IDENT;
    p_trec.validate_ind                      := :pl_tld_runway_sr.validate_ind;
    p_trec.localizer_mls_gls_ident           := :pl_tld_runway_sr.localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    p_trec.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident    := :pl_tld_runway_sr.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    p_trec.customer_ident                    := :pl_tld_runway_sr.customer_ident;
    p_trec.data_supplier                     := :pl_tld_runway_sr.data_supplier;
    p_trec.generated_in_house_flag           := :pl_tld_runway_sr.generated_in_house_flag;
    --p_trec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle;
    if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle then
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_sr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
    p_trec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_tld_runway_sr.create_dcr_number;
    -- Begin Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_trec.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS                 := :pl_tld_runway_sr.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS;
    p_trec.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS                 := :pl_tld_runway_sr.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS;
    -- End Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_tRec.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing         := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_SR.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing; --Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR' then
    p_trec.airport_icao                      := :pl_tld_runway_mr.airport_icao;
    p_trec.airport_ident                     := :pl_tld_runway_mr.airport_ident;
    p_trec.RUNWAY_IDENT                      := :pl_tld_runway_mr.RUNWAY_IDENT;
    p_trec.validate_ind                      := :pl_tld_runway_mr.validate_ind;
    p_trec.localizer_mls_gls_ident           := :pl_tld_runway_mr.localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    p_trec.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident    := :pl_tld_runway_mr.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident;
    p_trec.customer_ident                    := :pl_tld_runway_mr.customer_ident;
    p_trec.data_supplier                     := :pl_tld_runway_mr.data_supplier;
    p_trec.generated_in_house_flag           := :pl_tld_runway_mr.generated_in_house_flag;
    --p_trec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle;
    /*if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle then
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;*/
  	p_trec.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_runway_mr.processing_cycle; -- Fix SCR 7596 --Madhu--7-Sep-2023
    p_trec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number;
    -- Begin Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_trec.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS                 := :pl_tld_runway_sr.LOCALIZER_MLS_CLASS;
    p_trec.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS                 := :pl_tld_runway_sr.SECOND_LOCALIZER_CLASS;
    -- End Fix - SCR 4879 - Eswar KC - 28 - June - 2011
    p_tRec.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing         := :PL_TLD_RUNWAY_MR.Runway_Magnetic_Bearing;--Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu- 8-JUL-2013

  end if;     
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_RUNWAY_REF
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

Function check_runway_ref(p_table varchar2,
                           p_runway_ident varchar2,
                           p_cycle number,
                           p_cust  varchar2,
                           p_dcr   number) return varchar2 is
	v_count             number(5);
	v_stmt              varchar2(500);
	v_dcr_number        number;
	v_referencing_table varchar2(30);
	v_B_runway          varchar2(1) := 'N';
	v_type              varchar2(30);
	v_block             varchar2(30) := :system.cursor_block;
	v_airport_ident     varchar2(10) := name_in(v_block||'.AIRPORT_IDENT');
	v_airport_icao      varchar2(10) := name_in(v_block||'.AIRPORT_ICAO');
	cursor get_ref_info is
		select unique lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) 
  	from ref_table
   	where data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
   	and processing_cycle = p_cycle
   	and DCR_NUMBER = p_dcr
  	and (lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) like '%sid%'
  	or lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) like '%star%'
  	or lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) like '%approach%');
BEGIN
  select count(*) into v_count
  from ref_table
  where data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
  and processing_cycle = p_cycle
  and DCR_NUMBER = p_dcr
  and lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) not like '%sid%'
  and lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) not like '%star%'
  and lower(REFERENCING_TABLE_NAME) not like '%approach%';
  if v_count > 0 then
  	return 'no';
  else -- if this runway is only referenced by procedures
  	open get_ref_info;
  	loop
  		fetch get_ref_info into v_referencing_table;
    	exit when get_ref_info%notfound;
    	if v_referencing_table like '%sid%' then
    		v_type := 'sid';
    	elsif v_referencing_table like '%star%' then
    		v_type := 'star';
    	end if;	
    	if v_referencing_table like '%approach%' then		-- airport_approach, heliport_approach
    		v_stmt := 'select ''Y'' from '||
    						v_referencing_table||' '||
    						'where data_Supplier = '''||:global.data_Supplier||''' '||
    						'and   processing_cycle = '||p_cycle||' '||
    						'and ''RW''||approach_ident = '||substr(p_runway_ident,1,4)||'B'' '||
    						'and validate_ind in (''Y'',''S'',''H'')';
    	elsif v_referencing_table like '%heli%' then	 -- heliport_sid, heliport_star
    		v_stmt := 'select ''Y'' from '||
    							v_referencing_table||'_segment a, '||v_referencing_table||' b '||
    							'where a.data_Supplier = '''||:global.data_Supplier||''' '||
    							'and   a.processing_cycle = '||p_cycle||' '||
    							'and   a.transition_ident = '''||substr(p_runway_ident,1,4)||'B'' '||
    							'and   b.validate_ind in (''Y'',''S'',''H'') '||
    							'and   a.data_supplier = b.data_supplier '||
    							'and   a.processing_cycle = b.processing_cycle '||
    							'and   a.'||v_type||'_ident = b.'||v_type||'_ident '||
    							'and   a.heliport_ident = b.heliport_ident '||
    							'and   a.heliport_icao = b.heliport_icao';
    	else																					-- airport_sid, airport_star
    		v_stmt := 'select ''Y'' from '||
    							v_referencing_table||'_segment a, '||v_referencing_table||' b '||
    							'where a.data_Supplier = '''||:global.data_Supplier||''' '||
    							'and   a.processing_cycle = '||p_cycle||' '||
    							'and   a.transition_ident = '''||substr(p_runway_ident,1,4)||'B'' '||
    							'and   b.validate_ind in (''Y'',''S'',''H'') '||
    							'and   a.data_supplier = b.data_supplier '||
    							'and   a.processing_cycle = b.processing_cycle '||
    							'and   a.'||v_type||'_ident = b.'||v_type||'_ident '||
    							'and   a.airport_ident = b.airport_ident '||
    							'and   a.airport_icao = b.airport_icao';
    	end if;						
    	v_B_runway := forms_utilities.get_statement_result(v_stmt);
    	if v_B_runway = 'Y' then		-- 'B' runway exists
				if v_count = 0 then
					if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
						select count(*) into v_count
						from pl_std_runway
						where data_supplier = :global.data_Supplier
						and processing_cycle = p_cycle
						and runway_ident like substr(p_runway_ident,1,4)||'%'
						and runway_ident != p_runway_ident
						and airport_ident = v_airport_ident
						and airport_icao = v_airport_icao;
					else
						select count(*) into v_count
						from pl_tld_runway
						where data_supplier = :global.data_Supplier
						and processing_cycle = p_cycle
						and customer_ident = p_cust
						and runway_ident like substr(p_runway_ident,1,4)||'%'
						and runway_ident != p_runway_ident
						and airport_ident = v_airport_ident
						and airport_icao = v_airport_icao;
					end if;	
					if v_count > 1 then	-- exists at least 2 other runways
						null;  -- 'ok'
					else
						return 'no';
					end if;
				end if;
			else
				return 'no';
			end if;	
  	end loop;
  	close get_ref_info;
  end if;
  return 'ok';
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
   * Name                                            SET_UPDATE_DCR
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE SET_UPDATE_DCR(p_block varchar2, p_record sdv_records.cr_runway) IS
	get_rec_cur  cpt_types.refcur;
	rtld_runway PL_TLD_RUNWAY%rowtype;
	rstd_runway PL_STD_RUNWAY%rowtype;
	v_dcr        number      := name_in(p_block||'.create_dcr_number');
	v_cycle_data varchar2(4) := substr(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'),3);
	v_count      number      := 0;
BEGIN
	if p_block like 'PL_STD%' then
		open get_rec_cur for select * from pl_std_runway
							           where create_dcr_number = v_dcr;	
		loop
		fetch get_rec_cur into rstd_runway;
		exit when get_rec_cur%notfound;
		  v_count := v_count + 1;
		  if nvl(p_record.cust_area_code,'-')                  != nvl(rstd_runway.area_code,'-') or                                         
    		 nvl(p_record.displaced_threshold_distance,0)      != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_runway.displaced_threshold_distance),4,'0'),0) or                                          
    		 nvl(p_record.landing_threshold_elevation,0)     	 != nvl(rstd_runway.landing_threshold_elevation,0) or            
    		 nvl(p_record.localizer_mls_class,'-')             != nvl(rstd_runway.localizer_mls_class,'-') or                                    
    		 nvl(p_record.localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-')         != nvl(rstd_runway.localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-') or                                       
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_description,'-')              != nvl(rstd_runway.runway_description,'-') or                                         
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_gradient,'-')                 != nvl(rpad(rstd_runway.runway_gradient,5,' '),'-') or                                    
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_latitude,'-')                 != nvl(rstd_runway.runway_latitude,'-') or    
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_length,0)                   	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_runway.runway_length),5,'0'),0) or                                        
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_longitude,'-')                != nvl(rstd_runway.runway_longitude,'-') or                                     
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_magnetic_bearing,'-')         != nvl(rstd_runway.runway_magnetic_bearing,'-') or                                       
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_width,0)                    	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_runway.runway_width),3,'0'),0) or                                       
    		 nvl(p_record.second_localizer_class,'-')          != nvl(rstd_runway.second_localizer_class,'-') or                                        
    		 nvl(p_record.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-')  != nvl(rstd_runway.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-') or
    		 --Begin Fix SCR 7432.03 Harikrishna Ch 20-July-2018
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_accuracy_comp_ind,'-')        != nvl(rstd_runway.runway_accuracy_comp_ind,'-') or
         nvl(p_record.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind,'-')    != nvl(rstd_runway.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind,'-') or 
         --End Fix SCR 7432.03                                   
    		 nvl(p_record.stopway,0)                         	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_runway.stopway),4,'0'),0) or                                      
    		 nvl(p_record.threshold_crossing_height,0)       	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_runway.threshold_crossing_height),2,'0'),0) then
		  	 copy(:global.dcr_number, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
         copy(v_cycle_data, p_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');		
		  end if;  
		end loop;
		close get_rec_cur;
	elsif p_block like 'PL_TLD%' then
		open get_rec_cur for select * from pl_tld_runway
							           where create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
		loop
		fetch get_rec_cur into rtld_runway;
		exit when get_rec_cur%notfound;
		  v_count := v_count + 1;
			if nvl(p_record.displaced_threshold_distance,0)      != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_runway.displaced_threshold_distance),4,'0'),0) or                                          
    		 nvl(p_record.landing_threshold_elevation,0)     	 != nvl(rtld_runway.landing_threshold_elevation,0) or            
    		 nvl(p_record.localizer_mls_class,'-')             != nvl(rtld_runway.localizer_mls_class,'-') or                                    
    		 nvl(p_record.localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-')         != nvl(rtld_runway.localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-') or                                       
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_description,'-')              != nvl(rtld_runway.runway_description,'-') or                                         
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_gradient,'-')                 != nvl(rpad(rtld_runway.runway_gradient,5,' '),'-') or                                    
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_latitude,'-')                 != nvl(rtld_runway.runway_latitude,'-') or    
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_length,0)                   	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_runway.runway_length),5,'0'),0) or                                        
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_longitude,'-')                != nvl(rtld_runway.runway_longitude,'-') or                                     
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_magnetic_bearing,'-')         != nvl(rtld_runway.runway_magnetic_bearing,'-') or                                       
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_width,0)                    	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_runway.runway_width),3,'0'),0) or                                       
    		 nvl(p_record.second_localizer_class,'-')          != nvl(rtld_runway.second_localizer_class,'-') or                                        
    		 nvl(p_record.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-')  != nvl(rtld_runway.second_localizer_mls_gls_ident,'-') or 
    		 --Begin Fix SCR 7432.03 Harikrishna Ch 20-July-2018 
    		 nvl(p_record.runway_accuracy_comp_ind,'-')        != nvl(rtld_runway.runway_accuracy_comp_ind,'-') or
         nvl(p_record.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind,'-')    != nvl(rtld_runway.land_threselev_accr_comp_ind,'-') or
         --End Fix SCR 7432.03                                  
    		 nvl(p_record.stopway,0)                         	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_runway.stopway),4,'0'),0) or                                      
    		 nvl(p_record.threshold_crossing_height,0)       	 != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_runway.threshold_crossing_height),2,'0'),0) then
		  	 copy(:global.dcr_number, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
       	 copy(v_cycle_data, p_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');
	     end if;  
		end loop;
		close get_rec_cur;
	end if;
	if v_count = 0 then   -- it is a new record
		copy(:global.dcr_number, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
		copy(v_cycle_data, p_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');
	end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DELETE_DCR_NO
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

--Begin SCR 7470 --Madhu
PROCEDURE delete_dcr_no IS
	ls_length NUMBER;
	ls_DCR1   VARCHAR2(32000);
	ls_DCR2   VARCHAR2(32000);
BEGIN
	ls_length := instr(','||:global.new_dcr_no||',',','||:pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number||',');
	IF ls_length = 1 THEN
		ls_DCR1 := null;
	ELSE	
		ls_DCR1 := rtrim(ltrim(substr(:global.new_dcr_no,1,ls_length-2),', '),', ');
	END IF;
	ls_DCR2 := rtrim(ltrim(substr(:global.new_dcr_no,ls_length+1+length(:pl_tld_runway_mr.create_dcr_number)),', '),', ');
	:global.new_dcr_no := ltrim(ls_DCR1||','||ls_DCR2,', ');
END;
--End Fix SCR 7470 --Madhu
